title: unnai tudi sheyyum
sahitya:
unnai tudi sheyyum ennai En iduvarai uyya sheyyavillai ayyE murugaiyE


anupallavi

  cenni malai shErndun sEvaDi sArndiDum anbar anaivaraiyum Adarikkum nAthanE


caraNam    ponnaiyum poruLaiyum bhOgAdi sukhamedaiyum eNNi en manam Engi puNNAgi vIngavillai
ponnaDi unadaittAn enran gati enrE pOTri varuginrEn kaDait-tETruvAi inrE
